   Description  
________________
_______________________________________________________________
Photographer Leon goes into the city&#039;s subway system at night 
to take photographs. He saves a woman who is attacked by a gang 
by pointing out the videocamera. This young woman goes missing 
by the next day. Leon later finds clues in the photos he has 
taken that lead him to discover that butcher Mahogany is 
involved and may be a serial killer, and that there have been 
people going missing in the subway for at least a hundred
years. Leon&#039;s involvement quickly turns into a dark obsession,
